allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Advanced Gaussian Splats 3D Studio with full AI integration

Major Features:
✨ Multi-panel professional layout (3D Viewer, AI Chat, VLM Analysis, File Metadata)
🤖 Auto-detect objek 3D dengan AI Chat Assistant yang intelligent
📊 Auto-populate metadata saat file 3D di-load
📸 Auto-capture screenshot dan trigger VLM analysis
💬 Conversational Q&A dengan context dari screenshot 3D
🔍 VLM Analysis dengan references, accuracy, dan similar images
📱 Responsive design (desktop grid + mobile tabs)

Technical Implementation:
- chatWithImage() method untuk conversational AI dengan image context
- Auto-send metadata dari iframe ke React via postMessage
- Auto-screenshot setelah 2 detik render + auto initial analysis
- Chat history untuk context-aware conversation
- useCallback hook untuk proper React optimization
- Error handling dan loading states lengkap

Workflow Automation:
1. User upload file 3D (.ply/.splat/.ksplat)
2. ✅ AUTO: Metadata terisi (filename, size, format, vertices)
3. ✅ AUTO: Screenshot di-capture setelah 2 detik
4. ✅ AUTO: VLM Analysis panel mulai analisis
5. ✅ AUTO: Chat Assistant deteksi objek dan kirim deskripsi
6. User bisa tanya apapun tentang objek via chat

UI/UX:
- Dark theme dengan glassmorphism effects
- Live status indicators dan badges
- Smooth transitions dan animations
- Professional control buttons (Refresh, Maximize, Settings)
- Mobile-friendly dengan 4 tab navigation

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
